text: Tomás Franco Tavares (born 7 March 2001) is a Portuguese professional footballer who plays as a right back for Spanish club Deportivo Alavés, on loan from S.L. Benfica. ==Club career== Tavares started his football career at S.L. Benfica's youth system. He signed his first professional contract with the club on 2 July 2018.https://www.slbenfica.pt/en- us/agora/noticias/2018-2019/07/02/tomas-tavares-futebol-benfica-assina- contrato-profissional-tres-anos He made his professional debut with Benfica B in a 2–1 LigaPro win over U.D. Oliveirense on 23 August 2019. On 10 September 2019, Tavares debuted for the first team as a starter in a 2–1 home loss to RB Leipzig in the UEFA Champions League. He made his Primeira Liga debut as a 12th-minute substitute in a 1–0 home win over Vitória de Setúbal on 28 September. On 3 October 2020, Tavares was loaned to La Liga side Deportivo Alavés for the 2020–21 season. ==International career== Tavares is a youth international for Portugal, having represented the nation's under-19 team. ==Personal life== Born in Peniche, Portugal, Tavares is of Cape Verdean descent. ==References== ==External links== * * * National team data Category:2001 births Category:Living people Category:People from Peniche, Portugal Category:Black Portuguese sportspeople Category:Portuguese people of Cape Verdean descent Category:Association football defenders Category:Portuguese footballers Category:LigaPro players Category:Primeira Liga players Category:S.L. title: Tomás Tavares
